Title: The Sorrowful Journey Home
Description:
I intend to burn Ryton's breastplate and Sir Ashrealm's tinderbox at Mereldar. I would be honored if you would join me.

Would you carry the breastplate there?
ObjectivesText: Do Faerin the honor of delivering Ryton Blackholme's Breastplate to Mereldar in Hallowfall.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver Ryton Blackholme's Breastplate to Faerin Lothar at Mereldar in Hallowfall.
RewardText: You have done the Arathi a great service this day. Please stay and help us pay our respects to Ryton and Sir Ashrealm.
